alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 5:58AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST/1015 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by earlier upstream rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Little Colorado River near Bird Springs. * WHEN...Until 915 PM MST Friday /1015 PM MDT Friday/. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Little Colorado River near Bird Springs, including the bridge along Navajo Route 71. Deadly flooding over low-water crossings along the Little Colorado River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 552 AM MST /652 AM MDT/, river gauges continue to indicate high water along the Little Colorado River. Water levels have begun to recede in Winslow, however they will likely remain elevated through this evening. As a result, significant flow is expected to continue along the Little Colorado River near Bird Springs. - This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Little Colorado River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bird Springs. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away! The banks of creeks and washes are unstable and unsafe during any flooding event. Low water crossings will become dangerous. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
